sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
ORDER BY ROWID DESC ) A ) B
WHERE RNUM >= #startRow# AND RNUM <= #endRow#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE BUYER SET BUYER_DELETE = 'Y' WHERE BUYER_ID = #buyer_id#
sqlMap.update: update buyer set BUYER_DELETE = #buyer_delete#, BUYER_ID = #buyer_id#, BUYER_NAME = #buyer_name#, BUYER_LGU = #buyer_lgu#, BUYER_BANK = #buyer_bank#, BUYER_BANKNO = #buyer_bankno#, BUYER_BANKNAME = #buyer_bankname#, BUYER_ZIP = #buyer_zip#, BUYER_ADD1 = #buyer_add1#, BUYER_ADD2 = #buyer_add2#, BUYER_COMTEL = #buyer_comtel#, BUYER_FAX = #buyer_fax#, BUYER_MAIL = #buyer_mail#, BUYER_CHARGER = #buyer_charger# WHERE BUYER_ID = #buyer_id#
